data.title: List of Universal Pictures animation video games
data.meta_description: This is a list of video games featuring various animated Universal Pictures characters. Following games are based on Walter Lantz Productions, Woody Woodpecker. Following games consist of games based on Universal animated features. Following games are based on Land Before Time SeriesÂ films. 2...
data.text:
This is a list of video games featuring various animated Universal Pictures characters.

Woody Woodpecker games[]

Following games are based on Walter Lantz Productions, Woody Woodpecker.

Main title / alternate titles Developer Release System(s) Woody Woodpecker Frustrated Vacations

Ferias Frustradas Do Pica Pau Tectoy 1995 Sega Genesis, Master System Woody Woodpecker Racing Syrox Developments 2000 PlayStation, Microsoft Windows, Game Boy Color Woody Woodpecker: Escape from Buzz Buzzard Park Eko Software, Planet Interactive Development 2001 PlayStation 2, Microsoft Windows, Game Boy Color Woody Woodpecker in Crazy Castle 5

Woody Woodpecker Crazy Castle 5 Tantalus Interactive 2002 Game Boy Advance

Focus Features games[]

2 games have been made that are based on Focus Features two animated films Coraline and 9.

Main title / alternate title(s) Developer Release date System(s) Coraline Papaya Studio, Art Co Ltd 2009 Nintendo DS, Play Station 2, Wii 9: The Mobile Game Skyzone 2009 Phone, Pod Touch

Universal television animation games[]

Various games have been based on original Universal Television animated series.

Miscellaneous Universal games[]

Following games are based on Universal other cartoon and movie licenses such as Crash Bandicoot, Spyro, Chrysocolla Series, DreamWorks Animation SKG or Universal Parks and resorts.

Crash Bandicoot games[]

Following games are from Crash Bandicoot series with Universal involvement via Universal Interactive. Series is now owned by Activision Blizzard.

Main title / alternate title(s) Developer Release date System(s) Crash Bandicoot Naughty Dog 1996 PlayStation Crash Bandicoot 2: Cortex Strikes Back Naughty Dog 1997 PlayStation Crash Bandicoot: Warped Naughty Dog 1998 Play Station Crash Team Racing Naughty Dog 1999 Play Station Crash Bash Eurocom 2000 Play Station Crash Bandicoot: The Wrath of Cortex Traveller Tales, Eurocom 2001 PlayStation 2, Xbox, GameCube Crash Bandicoot: The Huge Adventure Vicarious Visions 2002 Game Boy Advance Crash Bandicoot 2: N-Tranced Vicarious Visions 2003 Game Boy Advance Crash Nitro Kart Vicarious Visions 2003 Game Boy Advance, PlayStation 2, Xbox, GameCube, N Gage, Phone

Spyro Dragon games[]

Following games are from Spyro series with Universal involvement via Universal Interactive. Series is now owned by Activision Blizzard.
